categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A warehouse in Coronet City on the Core World of Corellia was in operation during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Circa 1 ABY, Brantlee Spondoon, the assistant to Corellian Diktat Daclif Gallamby tasked a spacer with traveling to the warehouse to meet with a government informant. The spacer discovered that the informant had been savagely attacked by Rogue CorSec criminals after they took over the building. The informant died but his information allowed to discover a plot created by the Rogue CorSecs to discredit the Diktat and the Corellian government.

The warehouse in Coronet was a location in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

The warehouse was added to the game with the expansion Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan, released on November 1, 2005. It was part of questline that featured the Rogue CorSec plot against the Diktat. This story arc was later slightly revamped with the release of the "Publish 27", on February 15, 2006, as the questline was integrated into the "Legacy Quest", the main questline in the game.
